about.title: About us
about.paragraph1: Discover the charm of SAARstay, a modern retreat that captures the essence of island life in Kuressaare. Enjoy a peaceful stay steeped in the island's rich culture.
about.paragraph2: Our guesthouse is designed with your comfort in mind, featuring well-appointed kitchens, cozy living spaces, and tranquil bedrooms. Relax in our sauna or hot tub at your leisure.
about.paragraph3: Uncover the quiet elegance of our hideaway. Explore the nearby cultural landmarks. Delight in the changing seasons of Saaremaa. Make yourself at home in a place where modern amenities meet island simplicity.
about.cta: Come find a unique blend of relaxation and local experiences at Saarstay. Ready for an unforgettable stay? Book with us today.

footer.aboutDescription: Nestled in Kuressaare, SAARStay Guesthouse is a cozy retreat offering a memorable island experience with comfortable accommodations and attentive service. Connect with the tranquility of Saaremaa at SAARStay.

prices.title: Prices
prices.priceIncludes: The price includes use of sauna and the hot tub.
prices.specialOffer: Ask for a special offer for longer reservations.

offers.description: Welcome to SAARstay, where contemporary design meets cozy convenience, providing a sophisticated sanctuary for every guest
offers.title: What We Offer

hero.title: City charm meets contemporary elegance
hero.description: Embrace the fusion of modern elegance and city charm in the pulsating heart of Kuressaare.

guestName.maxLength: Guest name must be less than 100 characters.
guestName.invalidCharacters: Guest name must only contain letters, spaces, hyphens, and apostrophes.

guestEmail.maxLength: Email must be less than 100 characters.

guestContactNumber.maxLength: Contact number must be less than 20 characters.
guestContactNumber.invalidFormat: Invalid contact number format. Must contain only numbers, plus, hyphens, parentheses, and spaces.

checkInDate.pastDate: Check-in date cannot be in the past.

checkOutDate.pastDate: Check-out date cannot be in the past.

numberOfGuests.integer: Number of guests must be an integer.
numberOfGuests.minGuests: At least one guest is required.
numberOfGuests.maxGuests: Number of guests must be less than or equal to 10.

specialRequests.maxLength: Special requests must be less than 500 characters.

error.dateExpected: The date provided is invalid. Please provide a valid date.

bookingConfirmation.title: Booking Confirmation
bookingConfirmation.confirmationEmailSent: A confirmation email has been sent to
bookingConfirmation.checkYourInbox: Please check your inbox for the booking details and contact us if you need any further assistance.
